tool_description: GTFS Pro API: Integrate real-time public transit data into your apps.
name: Gtfs.pro
title: Gtfs.pro

api_list.name: Ireland Trip Updates
api_list.description: Access real-time updates on bus and rail services across Ireland, including arrival times, departures, and schedule changes. This comprehensive endpoint supports seamless travel planning for both bus and rail passengers in Ireland, ensuring they have the most current information for their journeys.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gtfs-pro1.p.rapidapi.com/api/ireland/trip-updates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gtfs-pro1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
